Interests

My interest peaked in software after supporting a Content Management System (CMS) and learning how the backend enabled the frontend.  After attending a JavaScript Fullstack Bootcamp, I've continued learning and completed various Fullstack projects. My projects are a combination of the JavaScript MERN stack (Mongodb, Express, React and Nodejs), PERN stack (Postgres, Express, React and Nodejs) and AWS microservices Cloud Technologies.

I'm most interested in exploring the latest advancements in backend technologies and working to advance my skills. I'm currently learning the server-side language Python and it’s frameworks.
